meanings.definition: Forward or onward movement towards a destination or goal.
meanings.sent1: The progress of the turtle was slow but steady towards the finish line.
meanings.sent2: She tracked her progress in the marathon using a fitness app.
meanings.sent3: The snail challenged the turtle to a race to test their progress.
meanings.sent4: Her progress in learning the piano was like a steady stream flowing towards mastery.
meanings.sent5: The progress of the seed growing into a plant was a beautiful sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Development towards an improved or more advanced state.
meanings.sent1: The progress of technology has made communication easier than ever before.
meanings.sent2: The progress of the students was evident in their improved test scores.
meanings.sent3: The progress of the cake baking in the oven filled the kitchen with a delicious aroma.
meanings.sent4: Her progress in painting was like watching a masterpiece come to life on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The progress of the city skyline changing over time was a testament to growth and innovation.

meanings.definition: A forward or onward movement, as in time.
meanings.sent1: The progress of the clock's hands marked the passing of each hour.
meanings.sent2: The progress of the sun across the sky signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent3: The progress of the river flowing downstream carried leaves along its path.
meanings.sent4: Her progress in reading the novel was like a journey through time and space.
meanings.sent5: The progress of the seasons changing brought new colors to the landscape.
